attributes.additional_details: The Isle of Wight is not a County. It comes under Hampshire and has a PO (Portsmouth) postcode. The Isle gets charged extra delivery for being an Island and some companies class it as a Channel Island?? If the Island is going to be charged extra then make the Isle of Wight a County in itself or make a complaint to OFT and stop the Isle being charged extra delivery charges on packages etc.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the companies making such charges.
